lead_paragraph: The GTI strikes an excellent balance between performance and practicality. It was the original hot hatchback and remains the one to beat.
snippet: The GTI strikes an excellent balance between performance and practicality. It was the original hot hatchback and remains the one to beat....

headline.main: Video Review: 2017 Volkswagen Golf GTI SE
headline.print_headline: VW’s Triple Threat: Refinement, Performance and Utility
